metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6873 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Self recursion in compact in Facebook HHVM before 3.15.0 allows attackers to have unspecified impact via unknown vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6873` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

hhvm - 3.12.11+dfsg-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hhvm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.11+dfsg-1build1').
